attributes.action: forget road pricing and incorporate all taxes and duties to do with driving into fuel taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those who choose (or have) to drive high mileages or those who choose to drive fuel-hungry vehicles will pay the most - thus genuinely paying "by the mile". The Road Fund Licence disk currently displayed on each vehicle should be replaced with a DVLA disk that confirms the vehicle is both insured and has met any relevant testing by the existing agencies.  Further, all driving licence-holders should be required to sit a driving re-test every 10 years at their own expense. THIS (and not "snooping on the public" with so-called road pricing) will REALLY reduce congestion.
